description.fr:
{%FightTurnStarted} Il gagne {ATvalue:v, +, percent} et {PropertyEffect:195} pour le tour s’il n’y a pas de {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:one} {PropertyEffect:82} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
\---
{%Attack} S'il est {PropertyEffect:195[oxydé]}, soigne les alliés des dégâts infligés.
description.en:
{%FightTurnStarted} He gains {ATvalue:v, +, percent} and {PropertyEffect:195} for the turn if there aren't any surrounding\_<sprite name="cell_around"> {PropertyEffect:82} {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:other}.
\---
{%Attack} If he is {PropertyEffect:195[oxidized]}, heals allies with damage done.
description.es:
{%FightTurnStarted} Gana un {ATvalue:v, +, percent} y {PropertyEffect:195} durante el turno si no hay ningún {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:one} {PropertyEffect:82} alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
\---
{%Attack} Si está {PropertyEffect:195[oxidado]}, cura a los aliados los daños infligidos.
description.de:
{%FightTurnStarted} Erhält {ATvalue:v, +, percent} und {PropertyEffect:195} für die Runde, wenn kein {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:one} {PropertyEffect:82} in der Nähe\_<sprite name="cell_around"> vorhanden ist.
\---
{%Attack} Wenn es {PropertyEffect:195[oxidiert]} ist, heilt es Verbündete um den erlittenen Schaden.
description.pt:
{%FightTurnStarted} Ele ganha {ATvalue:v, +, percent} e {PropertyEffect:195} durante o turno se não houver {%Family_Vampyre_Name,plural:one} {PropertyEffect:82} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
\---
{%Attack} Se estiver {PropertyEffect:195[oxidado]}, cura os aliados dos danos infligidos.
